question.body: Which of the following systems is not properly matched with their integration with the skeletal system?

multiple_choice.choice: Calcium from the bones is used for muscle contraction.
Calcium from the bones is used in nerve impulses.
Calcium levels are controlled by the cardiovascular system.
Calcium levels are controlled by the endocrine system.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Calcium is used in muscle contraction.
Incorrect. Calcium is used in nerve impulses.
Correct. Calcium is transported by the cardiovascular system.
Incorrect. Calcium levels are controlled by the endocrine system.
